set.name: DMD-23 Due-ma Start Deck: Miracle Bringer Light Civilization

card.name: Miracle Star, Lord of Dragon Spirits

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your light creatures. When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose 2 of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap them. Those creatures don't untap at the start of his next turn. Triple breaker(This creature breaks 3 shields)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your light creatures. ​ Blocker(Whenever an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the 2 creatures battle) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) At the end of each of your turns, untap this creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your light creatures. When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may add the top card of your deck to your shields face down. ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields)

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the end of each of your turns, untap this creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​ Shield trigger(When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it for no cost) When you put this creature into the battle zone, for each of your creatures in the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​ Shield trigger(When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it for no cost) Choose up to 3 of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap them. Mana Arms 5: If you have 5 or more light cards in your mana zone, each of the chosen creatures don't untap at the start of your opponent's next turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your light evolution creatures may each cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost less than 1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​ Shield trigger(When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it for no cost) If you have 2 shields or less when you put this creature into the battle zone, add the top card of your deck to your shields face down.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​ Shield trigger(When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it for no cost) When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​ Blocker(Whenever an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the 2 creatures battle) This creature can't attack players. Mana Arms 3: When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you have 3 or more light cards in your mana zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it. That creature doesn't untap at the start of your opponent's next turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each turn, you may have the first light creature you summon cost 1 less. It can't cost less than 1.
